
# MoreApples
[![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/Stoupy51/MoreApples?logo=github&label=GitHub)](https://github.com/Stoupy51/MoreApples/releases/latest)
[![Smithed](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.smithed.dev%2Fv2%2Fpacks%2Fmore-apples%2Fmeta&query=%24.stats.downloads.total&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%3D%3D&logoColor=224bbb&label=Smithed&labelColor=black&color=224bbb)](https://smithed.net/packs/more-apples)
[![Modrinth](https://img.shields.io/modrinth/dt/more-apples?logo=modrinth&label=Modrinth)](https://modrinth.com/datapack/more-apples)

üçé More Apples is a simple data pack that enhances your Minecraft experience by making all types of leaves drop delicious apples!<br>
Every leaf block now has double the chance to drop apples compared to vanilla oak leaves.

üå≥ Works with all leaf types:
- üå¥ Acacia leaves
- üåø Azalea leaves 
- üå≥ Birch leaves
- üå∏ Cherry leaves
- üå≤ Dark Oak leaves
- üå∫ Flowering Azalea leaves
- üå¥ Jungle leaves
- üå¥ Mangrove leaves
- üå≥ Oak leaves
- üå≤ Spruce leaves

Originally created as a personal request, now available for everyone to enjoy! üéâ
